Type.SourceCode:
class VDOM_text(VDOM_object): def render(self, parent, contents=""): font=[ self.fontweight if self.fontweight=="bold" else None, self.fontstyle if self.fontstyle=="italic" else None, "%spx"%self.fontsize or "12px", self.fontfamily or None] style_zindex = u"z-index:%s;" % self.zindex if int(self.zindex) <> 0 else u"" style={ "display": "none" if self.visible=="0" else None, "position": self.position, "overflow": "auto", "top": "%spx"%self.top, "left": "%spx"%self.left, "width": "%spx"%self.width, "text-align": self.align or None, "font": " ".join(filter(None, font)), "color" : "#%s"%self.color if self.color else None, "text-decoration": self.textdecoration or None} if VDOM_CONFIG_1["DEBUG"] == "1": debug_info = u"objtype='text' objname='%s' ver='2011-12-02'" % self.name else: debug_info = u"" result="
%(value)s
"%{ "zind": style_zindex, "debug_info": self.name, "id": self.id_special, "style": "; ".join(["%s: %s"%(key, value) for key, value in style.iteritems() if value]), "css": "; %s"%self.css if self.css else "", "classname": self.classname, "value": self.value} return VDOM_object.render(self, parent, contents=result) def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""): value=""%self.value if self.value else "" fontsize="fontsize=\"%s\""%self.fontsize if self.fontsize else "" editable="value,color,fontfamily,fontsize,fontstyle,fontweight,align,textdecoration" result=""\ "%s"\ "%s"%( self.id, self.visible, self.zindex, self.hierarchy, self.order, self.top, self.left, self.width, 0, 0, self.width, self.color, self.fontstyle, self.fontweight, self.fontfamily, fontsize, self.align, self.textdecoration, editable, value, contents) return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=result)
